main.API

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.API.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to enable validation and scoring of a play on a scrabble board. Created by sujay on 7/27/17.

    • Constructor Summary

      Board()

      Builds the vertical word in which the letter at the provided coordinate in the provided model If the provided coordinate is empty, returns the prefix to the word that would exist if a tile were placed there.

      Builds the vertical word in which the letter at the provided coordinate in the provided model If the provided coordinate is empty, returns the prefix to the word that would exist if a tile were placed there.

      Requires: validMove(boardBeforeMove, boardAfterMove) to be true Returns the score for the move represented by the difference boardAfterMove and boardBeforeMove.

      static boolean validMove(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Character>> boardBeforeMove, java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Character>> boardAfterAttemptedMove, Trie trie)
      Returns if the board state in boardAfterAttemptedMove is a valid play off of boardBeforeMove

    • Method Detail

      • validMove

        public static boolean validMove(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Character>> boardBeforeMove,
                                java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Character>> boardAfterAttemptedMove,
                                Trie trie)
        Returns if the board state in boardAfterAttemptedMove is a valid play off of boardBeforeMove
        Parameters:
        boardBeforeMove - the scrabble board before the move
        boardAfterAttemptedMove - the scrabble board after the attempted move
        trie - the trie representing the dictionary to use for validation
        Returns:
        true is boardAfterAttemptedMove is a valid state after boardBeforeMove, false otherwise

      • scoreMove

        public static int scoreMove(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Character>> boardBeforeMove,
                            java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Character>> boardAfterValidatedMove)
        Requires: validMove(boardBeforeMove, boardAfterMove) to be true Returns the score for the move represented by the difference boardAfterMove and boardBeforeMove.
        Parameters:
        boardBeforeMove - the scrabble board before the move
        boardAfterValidatedMove - the scrabble board after the validated move
        Returns:
        the score for the play

      • scoreVertical

        public static int scoreVertical(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Character>> boardBeforeValidatedMove,
                                java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Character>> boardAfterValidatedMove,
                                javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> coord)
        Requires: validMove(boardBeforeMove, boardAfterMove) to be true Returns the score for the move represented by the difference boardAfterMove and boardBeforeMove.
        Parameters:
        boardBeforeValidatedMove - the scrabble board before the validated move
        boardAfterValidatedMove - the scrabble board after the validated move
        coord - the coordinate for which we should score a vertically oriented word for the play
        Returns:
        the score for the vertical word involving coord in boardAfterValidatedMove

      • scoreHorizontal

        public static int scoreHorizontal(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Character>> boardBeforeValidatedMove,
                                  java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Character>> boardAfterValidatedMove,
                                  javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> coord)
        Requires: validMove(boardBeforeMove, boardAfterMove) to be true Returns the score for the move represented by the difference boardAfterMove and boardBeforeMove.
        Parameters:
        boardBeforeValidatedMove - the scrabble board before the validated move
        boardAfterValidatedMove - the scrabble board after the validated move
        coord - the coordinate for which we should score a horizontally oriented word for the play
        Returns:
        the score for the horizontal word involving coord in boardAfterValidatedMove

      • buildVerticalWordForCoordinate

        public static javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> buildVerticalWordForCoordinate(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Character>> board,
                                                                                                  javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> pair)
        Builds the vertical word in which the letter at the provided coordinate in the provided model If the provided coordinate is empty, returns the prefix to the word that would exist if a tile were placed there.
        Parameters:
        board - the model to use for construction of the word
        pair - coordinate
        Returns:
        the word itself, as well as the starting index of the word

      • buildHorizontalWordForCoordinate

        public static javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> buildHorizontalWordForCoordinate(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Character>> board,
                                                                                                    javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> pair)
        Builds the vertical word in which the letter at the provided coordinate in the provided model If the provided coordinate is empty, returns the prefix to the word that would exist if a tile were placed there.
        Parameters:
        board - the model to use for construction of the word
        pair - coordinate
        Returns:
        the word itself, as well as the starting index of the word

      • computeCrossCheckSets

        public static java.util.HashSet<java.lang.Character>[][] computeCrossCheckSets(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Character>> model,
                                                                               Trie trie)
        Computes the VERTICAL cross check sets for a given model. To compute the horizontal cross check sets for that model, pass in model transpose and take the transpose of the output of this function.
        Parameters:
        model - the scrabble board
        trie - the trie to use for validation of plays in the board
        Returns:
        the vertical cross-check sets for model under the constraints of trie
